code_value: Car sickness can make family vacations miserable for both the sufferer and the rest of the family. Symptoms range from a general feeling of discomfort to vomiting. Doctors say the discomfort results from conflicting messages being sent to the brain. The brain relies on messages from the inner ear, the muscles and the eyes to tell where the body is in space. When any of these systems send different messages, the brain gets confused, and you feel that you are going to vomit.
